reviewText: As a coach AND teacher - this is one of the better series I've run across.  Very thorough and well-designed.  Production value getting a little dated; I'd buy a re-issue if they produced one.
This DVD has given me the skills to become a show stopper. Defense win championships and I think I have what it takes to win it all

This DVD has all the information and inspiration to get a player or coach to the next level.
 All the defense moves and drills are covered in a fast paced interesting style.  The second and third time watching will give you more information and ideas.
 If you want defense to be your game,this is the DVD.
